attributes.Name: Amore.
attributes.eventDescription: Let's party this Valentines day with a Louby Lou valentines disco special! Only £10 per child! All ages are welcome! Let's have a boogy full of excitement, love and joy!

attributes.Name: Self.
attributes.eventDescription: Half term giggles are only around the corner! School can be stressful for the little ones, let's take this time to help ease that stress and have a little bit of fun! With Music, Magic & More, expect some classic Louby Lou fun at Self Westhoughton!
